concept.title: VPC Networking Concepts
concept.shortdesc: This section discusses VPC networking concepts and terminology.

conbody.note: This technical preview documentation assumes that you have some knowledge of IP addressing, CIDR, route tables, and subnets. Please see the links included throughout the documentation for more information on these topics.
This feature is in technical preview. For information about technical previews in Eucalyptus, go to Eucalyptus Technology Preview Features Support Scope
